Index >  OnPostAllTransfers

OnPostAllTransfers

Description

This event is triggered when all page(s) have been scanned and transferred.

Syntax

.RegisterEvent('OnPostAllTransfers',function(){...});

Remarks

This event fires after all pages in the document feeder have been scanned. This is a good place for you to upload the images or detect barcode on the images, etc.

See Also

OnPreAllTransfers
OnPreTransfer
OnPostTransfer

Example

DWObject.RegisterEvent('OnPostAllTransfers', function(){
    alert(DWObject.HowManyImagesInBuffer);
});
